introduce.title: What is Z Image Turbo?
introduce.label: About
introduce.description: Z Image Turbo is a fast AI-powered image generation platform. Create stunning, photorealistic images from text prompts or transform existing ones in seconds.

items.title: Lightning-fast Generation
items.description: High-quality results with only 8 inference steps, enabling near-instant image creation.

items.title: Photorealistic Quality
items.description: Lifelike lighting, materials, and textures for product, portrait, and scene generation.

items.title: Multilingual Text Rendering
items.description: Render clear text across languages with optimized English and Chinese support.

items.title: Strong Prompt Adherence
items.description: Complex prompts maintain consistent composition and style for reliable output.

features.title: Key Features of Z Image Turbo
features.description: Everything you need for fast text-to-image generation with a compact Z Image model focused on speed and quality.

items.title: Ultra-fast 8-step generation
items.description: The model reaches high-quality results with only 8 NFEs, enabling near-instant image creation.

items.title: Photorealistic detail
items.description: Deliver lifelike lighting, materials, and textures for product, portrait, and scene generation.

items.title: Multilingual text rendering
items.description: Render clear text across languages and support multilingual layouts.

items.title: Strong instruction following
items.description: The Z Image model follows complex prompts and keeps composition and style consistent.

items.title: Efficient 6B distilled model
items.description: A lightweight Z Image AI stack that fits 16GB VRAM-class devices without sacrificing quality.

items.title: Creative control
items.description: Guide style, mood, and camera cues to iterate quickly without starting over.

items.question: What is Z Image Turbo?
items.answer: It is a distilled 6B z image model designed for fast text-to-image generation with photorealistic quality and multilingual text rendering.

items.question: How fast is the model?
items.answer: It reaches strong results in 8 NFEs, enabling sub-second latency on modern GPUs and quick outputs on consumer hardware.

items.question: What does Z Image AI mean here?
items.answer: Z Image AI refers to the Z-Image family of models; this is the speed-optimized variant for production use.

items.question: Which models power text-to-image and image-to-image?
items.answer: Text-to-image uses Z Image Turbo. Image-to-image uses Seedream 4.5. We also rely on third-party model and infrastructure providers to deliver the service. Z Image Turbo is an independent product and is not affiliated with or endorsed by third-party model providers.

items.question: How does it compare with qwen image?
items.answer: If you are evaluating qwen image, test the same prompts and compare speed, fidelity, and text rendering to choose the best fit.

items.question: Can I use outputs commercially?
items.answer: Yes, subject to your content rights and applicable licensing terms.

items.question: How do I craft effective prompts?
items.answer: Start with subject and style, add lighting and camera cues, then specify layout or text to guide the model.

brand.title: Z Image Turbo
brand.description: A fast text-to-image generator built on the Z-Image family, combining speed, quality, and multilingual text rendering.
